name: Space Cowboy (itch) (willwright)
description:
You are Rangernaut 037, sent on a mission to recover your precious solar cows. Shoot your revolver and swing with your lasso to maneuver around space, while avoiding dangerous cacti!

Game Controls

[Left Click] Shoot

[Right Click] Lasso

[R] Restart

Menu Controls

[Escape] Pause

[Backspace] Level Select

Music - Lunar Prairie by Ben Reber - https://soundcloud.com/user-411047148
